description: Installation of a cycle hire docking station as part of the Transport for London Cycle Hire Scheme
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  Prior to the commencement of works full details, including detailed drawings at a scale of 1:10 shall be submitted for the following parts of the proposal;
i) Design of the Docking Points

No works shall take place until the Councils written approval is received.  The development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the approved details. No change shall take place from this arrangement without the prior written consent of the local planning authority.

REASON:  To accord with policies D1, D4, D11, T34, T45, T52 and Env9 of the Islington UDP 2002 and the objectives of the Islington Streetbook 2005.  Ensuring that the appearance of the docking station is suitable and does not harm the character of the surrounding area; in the interests of public safety; to allow ease of access and use by all users.
